Is this quote from that movie

In this quiz are four types of questions: 
		1. recognize if the quote belongs to the movie from the picture, 
		2. recognize the quote and link it to the movie (only one from those who are listed), 
		3. write the name of the movie, 
		4. recognize the movie name and actor who said the quote 
	Have fun and good luck!
